analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x2ad8529da0488a7c2a1af1e22d1902f7ad2943eb.sol:
	Contract BCAChainToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x2ad8529da0488a7c2a1af1e22d1902f7ad2943eb.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/2/0x2ad8529da0488a7c2a1af1e22d1902f7ad2943eb.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
